scripts.start:dev-client: yarn with-env yarn expo:prebuild && yarn expo start --dev-client
scripts.expo:prebuild: yarn with-env yarn expo prebuild --skip-dependency-update react-native,react
scripts.eas:build:dev:simulator:ios:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development yarn with-env eas build --profile development:simulator --platform ios --local
scripts.eas:build:dev:simulator:ios: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development yarn with-env eas build --profile development:simulator --platform ios
scripts.eas:build:dev:simulator:android: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development yarn with-env eas build --profile development:simulator --platform android
scripts.eas:build:dev:device:ios: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development yarn with-env eas build --profile development:device --platform ios
scripts.eas:build:dev:device:android: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development yarn with-env eas build --profile development:device --platform android
scripts.eas:build:dev:android: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development yarn with-env eas build --profile development --platform android
scripts.eas:build:dev:ios: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development yarn with-env eas build --profile development --platform ios
scripts.eas:build:staging:android: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging APP_ENV=staging yarn with-env eas build --profile staging --platform android
scripts.eas:build:staging:ios: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging APP_ENV=staging yarn with-env eas build --profile staging --platform ios
scripts.eas:submit:dev:android: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development yarn with-env eas submit --profile staging --platform android
scripts.eas:submit:staging:android: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging APP_ENV=staging yarn with-env eas submit --profile staging --platform android
scripts.eas:submit:dev:ios: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development yarn with-env eas submit --profile staging --platform ios
scripts.eas:submit:staging:ios: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging APP_ENV=staging yarn with-env eas submit --profile staging --platform ios
scripts.eas:update:dev:android: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development yarn with-env eas update --channel staging --platform android
scripts.eas:update:staging:android: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging APP_ENV=staging yarn with-env eas update --channel staging --platform android
scripts.eas:update:dev:ios: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development yarn with-env eas update --channel staging --platform ios
scripts.eas:update:staging:ios: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging APP_ENV=staging yarn with-env eas update --channel staging --platform ios
